channel.title: How to Install Multilib :: Salix Documentation
channel.description: Warning Multilib is not officially supported in Salix and it is not recommended. Follow these instructions at your own risk. Original Source In this guide we will discuss how to install multilib support for 32bit apps on a 64bit Salix. It is based on a ‘full’ version of Salix. The source guide is more in-depth, this guide is only the minimal steps required for Salix. If you are using a more recent Salix version, adjust ‘15.
